## Setup

```{r}
rerun_models <- TRUE
```

```{r}
n_replicates <- 2 # number of technical replicates
n_measured <- 1 # number of biological replicates
model_types <- list("Normal", "Log-Normal", "dPCR", "dPCR_binomial") # different models to compare
```

## Simulation

```{r}
set.seed(123)

model_spec <- list(
    link_type = 1 # 0 = identity, 1 = log-link
)
x = seq(-5,5,length.out=10)

sim_data <- mapply(function(positive_proportion_true) {
  alpha_true <- log(-1/1.73e-5*log(1-positive_proportion_true))
  beta_true = 0.2
  cv_true <- 0.1 #extraDistr::rtnorm(1, 0, 0.5, a = 0)
  
  # Simulate concentrations
  true_concentration = exp(alpha_true + beta_true * x)
  conc_data = bind_rows(mapply(function (lambda, x_i) {
    sim_conc <- sim_conc_pre(
      lambda = lambda,
      m_partitions = sim_partitions(
        n_measured, n_replicates,
        max_partitions = 30000,
        partition_loss_logit_mean = -2,
        partition_loss_logit_sd = 0.4,
        partition_loss_max = 0.5
        ),
      c = 1.73e-5,
      cv = cv_true,
      n_replicates = n_replicates,
      distribution = "lnorm",
      n_samples = n_measured,
      get_partitions = T
    )
    sim_conc$x <- x_i
    sim_conc$date <- as.Date("1999-01-01") + x_i*10
    sim_conc$lambda <- lambda
    sim_conc$n_replicates <- n_replicates
    return(sim_conc)
    },
    lambda = true_concentration, x_i = x, SIMPLIFY = FALSE))
  return(list(
    alpha_true = alpha_true,
    beta_true = beta_true,
    cv_true = cv_true,
    true_concentration = true_concentration,
    conc_data = conc_data
))
},
positive_proportion_true = seq(0.1, 0.9, by = 0.1),
SIMPLIFY = FALSE)
```

```{r}
sim_data[[length(sim_data)-1]]$conc_data |> filter(!is.infinite(concentration))
sim_data[[length(sim_data)]]$conc_data |> filter(!is.infinite(concentration))
```


```{r}
lapply(sim_data, function(dat) {
  ggplot(dat$conc_data, aes(x=x, y=concentration)) +
  geom_point() +
  theme_bw() +
  ggtitle(round(exp(dat$alpha_true),2))
})
```

## Bayesian regression model

```{r}
fit_opts <- set_fit_opts(
  sampler = sampler_stan_mcmc(
    seed = 0, chains = 4, parallel_chains = 4, iter_warmup = 1000, iter_sampling = 1000
    )
  )
```

Fit all models
```{r}
 if (rerun_models) {
all_fits_all_data <- lapply(sim_data, function(dat) {
    all_fits <- mapply(function(model_type) {
      
      reg_formula <- concentration ~ x
      reg_link <- "log"
      
      if (model_type %in% c("Normal")) {
        fit <- dPCRfit(
          formula = reg_formula,
          data = dat$conc_data |>  filter(!is.infinite(concentration)),
          link = reg_link,
          prior_intercept = c(0, 10),
          prior_coefficients = c(0, 1),
          measurements = concentration_measurements(
            id_col = "date",
            concentration_col = "concentration",
            n_averaged_col = "n_replicates",
            distribution = "normal"
          ),
          noise = noise_constant_var(
            cv_prior_mu = 0, cv_prior_sigma = 0.5, warn = FALSE
          ),
          nondetect = nondetect_none(),
          fit_opts = fit_opts
        )
      } else if (model_type == "Log-Normal") {
        fit <- dPCRfit(
          formula = reg_formula,
          data = dat$conc_data |>  filter(!is.infinite(concentration)),
          link = reg_link,
          prior_intercept = c(0, 10),
          prior_coefficients = c(0, 0.5),
          measurements = concentration_measurements(
            id_col = "date",
            concentration_col = "concentration",
            n_averaged_col = "n_replicates",
            distribution = "lognormal"
          ),
          noise = noise_constant_cv(
            cv_prior_mu = 0, cv_prior_sigma = 0.5
          ),
          nondetect = nondetect_none(),
          fit_opts = fit_opts
        )
      } else if (model_type == "dPCR") {
        fit <- dPCRfit(
          formula = reg_formula,
          data = dat$conc_data |>  filter(!is.infinite(concentration)),
          link = reg_link,
          prior_intercept = c(0, 10),
          prior_coefficients = c(0, 0.5),
          measurements = concentration_measurements(
            id_col = "date",
            concentration_col = "concentration",
            n_averaged_col = "n_replicates",
            distribution = "gamma"
          ),
          noise = noise_dPCR(
            cv_prior_mu = 0, cv_prior_sigma = 0.5,
            max_partitions_prior_lower = 10000,
            max_partitions_prior_upper = 50000,
            partition_loss_mean_prior_lower = 0.01,
            partition_loss_mean_prior_upper = 0.3,
            partition_loss_variation_prior_lower = 0.5,
            partition_loss_variation_prior_upper = 2,
            partition_loss_max = 0.5,
            volume_scaled_prior_mu = 1e-5,
            volume_scaled_prior_sigma = 5e-6,
            prePCR_noise_type = "lognormal"
          ),
          nondetect = nondetect_dPCR(),
          fit_opts = fit_opts
        )
      } else if (model_type == "dPCR_binomial") {
        fit <- dPCRfit(
          formula = positive_partitions ~ x,
          data = dat$conc_data |> 
            filter(positive_partitions < total_partitions) |> 
            mutate(concentration = ifelse(is.infinite(concentration), NA, concentration)),
          link = reg_link,
          prior_intercept = c(0, 10),
          prior_coefficients = c(0, 0.5),
          measurements = positive_partitions(
            id_col = "date",
            positive_partitions_col = "positive_partitions",
            total_partitions_col = "total_partitions",
            n_averaged_col = "n_replicates"
          ),
          noise = noise_dPCR(
            cv_prior_mu = 0, cv_prior_sigma = 0.5,
            partitions_observe = TRUE,
            volume_scaled_prior_mu = 1.73e-5,
            volume_scaled_prior_sigma = 0,
            prePCR_noise_type = "lognormal"
          ),
          nondetect = nondetect_dPCR(),
          fit_opts = fit_opts
        )
      }
      return(list(fit = fit, model_type = model_type))
    },
    model_type = model_types,
    SIMPLIFY = FALSE
    )
    return(all_fits)
  })
}
```


## Results

```{r}
if (rerun_models) {
  res_beta_all <- rbindlist(mapply(function(fits, dat) {
    beta_res <- rbindlist(lapply(fits, function(res) res$fit$coef_summary[variable == "x",]))
    beta_res[, true := dat$beta_true]
    beta_res[, alpha := dat$alpha_true]
    beta_res[, model := purrr::list_c(model_types)]
  }, fits = all_fits_all_data, dat = sim_data, SIMPLIFY = FALSE))
  #saveRDS(res_beta_all, here::here("data", "results", "regression_range_simulated_beta.rds"))
} else {
  res_beta_all <- readRDS(here::here("data", "results", "regression_range_simulated_beta.rds"))
}
```

```{r}
if (rerun_models) {
  res_alpha_all <- rbindlist(mapply(function(fits, dat) {
    alpha_res <- rbindlist(lapply(fits, function(res) res$fit$coef_summary[variable == "(Intercept)",]))
    alpha_res[, true := dat$alpha_true]
    alpha_res[, model := purrr::list_c(model_types)]
  }, fits = all_fits_all_data, dat = sim_data, SIMPLIFY = FALSE))
  #saveRDS(res_alpha_all, here::here("data", "results", "regression_range_simulated_alpha.rds"))
} else {
  res_alpha_all <- readRDS(here::here("data", "results", "regression_range_simulated_alpha.rds"))
}
```


```{r}
inner_join(
  res_beta_all |> filter(model=="dPCR_binomial"),
  res_beta_all |> filter(model!="dPCR_binomial"),
  by = c("variable", "true", "alpha"), suffix = c("_binom", "")
) |> 
  mutate(
    diff_median = median - median_binom,
    diff_lower = lower_95 - lower_95_binom,
    diff_upper = upper_95 - upper_95_binom
    ) |>
  ggplot(aes(x=ftrans(alpha), y=abs(diff_median), color = model)) +
  geom_hline(yintercept = 0, linetype = "dashed") +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth() +
  facet_wrap(~model, ncol = 1, scales = "free_y") +
  scale_x_continuous(labels = scales::label_percent(accuracy = 0.01)) +
  xlab("Expected percentage of positive partitions") + ylab("Absolute error") +
  theme_bw() +
  scale_color_manual(values = (c("#007191","#d31f11","#f47a00"))) +
  scale_fill_manual(values = (c("#007191","#d31f11","#f47a00"))) +
  theme(
    legend.position = "top",
    legend.title = element_blank(),
    strip.background = element_rect(fill = "#f2f2f2")
  )

#ggsave(here::here("figures", "dPCR paper", "regression_range_validation_beta_error.pdf"), width = 10, height = 6)

```

```{r}
beta_coverage <- res_beta_all |>
  group_by(model) |> 
  summarize(coverage = round(sum(true <= upper_95 & true >= lower_95)/n(), 2)) |> 
  mutate(model_facet = factor(
    model,
    levels = c("dPCR_binomial", "dPCR", "Normal", "Log-Normal"),
    labels = (c("(A) Binomial", "(B) dPCR", "(C) Normal", "(D) Log-Normal")),
    ordered = T)
    ) |> mutate(
      text = paste0("Coverage: ", coverage*100, "%")
    )
```

```{r}
ftrans <- function(x) 1-exp(-exp(x)*1.73e-5)

res_beta_all |> 
  mutate(model_facet = factor(
    model,
    levels = c("dPCR_binomial", "dPCR", "Normal", "Log-Normal"),
    labels = (c("(A) Binomial", "(B) dPCR", "(C) Normal", "(D) Log-Normal")),
    ordered = T)
    ) |>
  mutate(model = factor(
    model,
    levels = c("dPCR_binomial", "dPCR", "Normal", "Log-Normal"),
    labels = (c("Binomial", "dPCR", "Normal", "Log-Normal")),
    ordered = T)
    ) |>
  ggplot(aes(x=ftrans(alpha))) +
  ggdist::geom_pointinterval(aes(y=mean, ymin=lower_95, ymax=upper_95, color = model)) +
  geom_hline(yintercept = res_beta_all$true[1], linetype = "dashed") +
  facet_wrap(~model_facet, ) +
  scale_x_continuous(labels = scales::label_percent(accuracy = 0.01)) +

  scale_color_manual(values = (c("darkgrey","#007191","#d31f11","#f47a00"))) +
  theme(
    legend.position = "top",
    legend.title = element_blank(),
    strip.background = element_rect(fill = "#f2f2f2")
  )
```
